title: Patel Engineering secures Rs 240 crore hydropower project from NHPC in Sikkim
description: Patel Engineering has secured a Rs 240 crore contract from NHPC for a hydropower project in Sikkim. The project involves modifying a diversion tunnel into a tunnel spillway arrangement and includes civil and hydro mechanical works. The order is expected to be completed within 18 months.
